channel.title: Faith on fearness.org
channel.description: Recent content in Faith on fearness.org

item.title: Guidence will Guide you through thick and thin.
item.description: Faith will guide your path. You do not need evidence or proof to fulfill your goals. Just pray and you will find that everything you need will be provided for you by Allah.

item.title: misc
item.description: Church Block Terror - A short story about an arsonist. End of the WORLD countdown TIMER! The offical May 21st and October 21st doomsday countdown timer. The reason no good deed goes unpunished, is a complex question that we have all asked from time to time. Learn about how you can master it and prevent yourself from being punished unfairly. The Jesus Deception. - This is an ongoing project of mine that I have worked on for the last few years, what I have learned in my studies simply shocked me and I feel that I can not in good conscience let the greatest lie ever told continue.
